alert.note: Alert for Clackamas (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 05 at 7:39AM PDT until November 05 at 5:17PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Clackamas River at Estacada affecting Clackamas County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clackamas River at Estacada. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 20.0 feet, expect lowland flooding from Estacada several miles downstream to Carver. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM PDT Saturday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon to 14.8 feet early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 500 PM PDT.
